languages.text: "А, ты, видимо, любишь веселые шутки. Я тоже". {n}Рот воина растягивается в зубастой неприятной улыбке.{/n}
"You enjoy telling jokes, I see. I do as well." {n}Ulfar's mouth stretches wide in a feral, unsettling grin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А, ты, видимо, любишь веселые шутки. Я тоже". {n}Рот воина растягивается в зубастой неприятной улыбке.{/n}

languages.text: “看得出来，你很喜欢开玩笑，我也一样。”{n}乌尔法咧开了嘴，露出了充满野性、令人不安的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You enjoy telling jokes, I see. I do as well." {n}Ulfar's mouth stretches wide in a feral, unsettling grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “看得出来，你很喜欢开玩笑，我也一样。”{n}乌尔法咧开了嘴，露出了充满野性、令人不安的笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Veo que disfruta con las bromas. Yo también». {n}La sonrisa de Ulfar es abierta, salvaje y preocupante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You enjoy telling jokes, I see. I do as well." {n}Ulfar's mouth stretches wide in a feral, unsettling grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Veo que disfruta con las bromas. Yo también». {n}La sonrisa de Ulfar es abierta, salvaje y preocupante.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「ジョークを言うのが好きなんだな。俺もだ」{n}ウルファーの口が大きく開き、不気味な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You enjoy telling jokes, I see. I do as well." {n}Ulfar's mouth stretches wide in a feral, unsettling grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ジョークを言うのが好きなんだな。俺もだ」{n}ウルファーの口が大きく開き、不気味な笑みを浮かべる。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Wie ich sehe, macht Ihr gerne Witze. Das tue ich ebenfalls." {n}Ulfars Mund weitet sich zu einem wilden, furchterregenden Grinsen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You enjoy telling jokes, I see. I do as well." {n}Ulfar's mouth stretches wide in a feral, unsettling grin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich sehe, macht Ihr gerne Witze. Das tue ich ebenfalls." {n}Ulfars Mund weitet sich zu einem wilden, furchterregenden Grinsen.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Vous aimez les plaisanteries, à ce que je vois. C'est aussi mon cas. » {n}La bouche d'Ulfar s'étire pour former un sourire sauvage quelque peu troublant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You enjoy telling jokes, I see. I do as well." {n}Ulfar's mouth stretches wide in a feral, unsettling grin.{/n}

languages.original_text: "You enjoy telling jokes, I see. I do as well." {n}Ulfar's mouth stretches wide in a feral, unsettling grin.{/n}

languages.text: "Şaka yapmayı seviyorsun. Ben de severim." {n}Ulfar'ın ağzı; vahşi, tedirgin edici bir gülümsemeyle açılıyor.{/n}
